@exitCode: Exit code as set by Exit statement.
_ArrayAdd: Adds a specified value at the end of an existing 1D or 2D array
ConsoleWrite: Writes data to the STDOUT stream.
InputBox: `InputBox ( "title", "prompt" [, "default" [, "password char" [, width = -1 [, height = -1 [, left = Default [, top = Default [, timeout = 0 [, hwnd]]]]]]]] )` _(function)_
Displays an input box to ask the user to enter a string.
MsgBox: Displays a simple message box with optional timeout.
